description: Common services used in the editor application

provides.name: loggedin
provides.description: Tells extensions when the user has logged in.

params.name: pointer
params.description: function to call when the user is logged in. An object representing the user will be passed in. The data on that object is application-specific at this time.

provides.name: loggedout
provides.description: Tells extensions when the user has logged out

params.name: pointer
params.description: function to call when the user is logged out. An object represeting the user will be passed in. The data on that object is application-specific at this time.
